channel.description: Recent content in git on Ahmed Hasan

item.title: Migrating an Overleaf project to GitHub
item.description: I've been a big proponent of Overleaf for some time now, having written both committee reports and assignments in it to great success in my grad school career thus far. Recently, I expanded my horizons a bit and made my first conference poster in LaTeX – something I admittedly found a bit head-spinning at first, but which eventually clicked just like everything else about LaTeX has in the past. After returning from the conference (and recovering from a good bit of jet lag) I decided I wanted to preserve the project within a GitHub repo: code, plots, and all.
